attributes.action: Change the law to make MPs charged with a crime immediately ineligible to continue representing his constituency.
attributes.additional_details: Highly placed individuals in public and private office who are charged with a crime are always suspended and denied access to their place of work, except MPs.  To allow MPs to continue in office being paid by taxpayers is a gross insult and is offensive to those taxpayers.  The argument that suspension 'from the party' is appropriate is of no significance to electors and further action is a party political act to avoid a by election.  WE SHOULD HAVE A BY ELECTION WHEN AN MP IS CHARGED WITH A CRIME.

rejection.details: This is a matter for a political party not for HM Government
